resource_section: Total number of Foreigners deported / extradited on detaining and departed from the Country on information to vacate through the process of Investigation Branch 2024 (As per Nationality)
remarks: Dataset contains deportation statistics by nationality for 2024, showing the number of deportations for each nationality. Columns: Nationality and Deportations. Data includes 38 nationalities with Indian nationals having the highest deportations (689), followed by Bangladeshi (400), Thai (31), Vietnamese (29), and Pakistani (18). The dataset provides insights into immigration enforcement activities and patterns of deportations by country of origin.
